title: User not created automatically on app load
description:
The app requires manual user selection via UserSelector instead of automatically creating a user. This causes localStorage 'bamboozled-userid' to remain null until user manually selects a name. Tests expect automatic user creation on page load.

Test failures:
- User Creation and Registration › should load the app and create a new user automatically
- User Creation and Registration › should handle localStorage clear and create new user

Expected: App should automatically create a user with a UUID in localStorage on first visit
Actual: UserSelector component is shown, blocking automatic user creation

Files affected:
- web-chat/src/App.tsx (lines 16, 37-38)
- tests/user-creation.spec.ts

title: Puzzle image not visible in UI
description:
Active puzzle image is not being displayed in the chat interface. Tests cannot find puzzle images using common selectors.

Test failure:
- Puzzle Guess Submission › should display active puzzle

Expected: Puzzle image should be visible with alt text or src containing 'puzzle'
Actual: No puzzle image found on page

The puzzle data exists in backend but is not being rendered in the frontend chat interface.

Files to investigate:
- web-chat/src/components/ChatWindow.tsx
- backend/src/websocket/chat.handler.ts (handleCommand for /puzzle)

title: Guess submission not showing AI responses
description:
When users submit guesses, the AI response messages are not appearing in the chat. Tests timeout waiting for response text.

Test failures:
- Puzzle Guess Submission › should submit a guess
- Puzzle Guess Submission › should show incorrect message for wrong answer
- Typo Handling in Answers › should accept answer with minor typo
- Typo Handling in Answers › should not accept partial answer
- Typo Handling in Answers › should handle multiple character typos gracefully

Expected: AI should respond with messages containing 'correct', 'incorrect', 'wrong', 'not quite', or 'you meant'
Actual: No response messages appear after guess submission

The backend likely processes guesses correctly but responses may not be sent via WebSocket or displayed in UI.

Files to investigate:
- web-chat/src/components/ChatWindow.tsx
- web-chat/src/hooks/useWebSocket.ts
- backend/src/websocket/chat.handler.ts

title: User info not displayed after creation
description:
After user is created, user information (name, mood tier, stats) is not visible in the UI.

Test failure:
- User Creation and Registration › should display user info after creation

Expected: User display name, mood tier, or welcome message should be visible
Actual: No user info found with text matching 'Player', 'User', or 'Welcome'

This may be related to the UserSelector blocking issue or missing UI components for displaying user data.

Files to investigate:
- web-chat/src/components/ChatWindow.tsx
- web-chat/src/App.tsx

title: Update Playwright tests for actual app flow
description:
Tests need to be updated to match the actual user flow which requires manual name entry via UserSelector.

Current tests assume automatic user creation, but the app requires:
1. User enters display name in UserSelector
2. WebSocket connects with 'init' message
3. Server creates user and returns userId
4. userId stored in localStorage as 'bamboozled-userid'

Tests should either:
- Interact with UserSelector to complete user setup
- OR app should be modified to auto-create users (see related issue)

Files to update:
- tests/user-creation.spec.ts
- tests/puzzle-guess.spec.ts  
- tests/typo-handling.spec.ts
